DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate add-on treatment inhale NVA237 ( 50 µg ) daily ( o.d . ) via single-dose dry-powder inhaler ( SDDPI ) improve lung function health status well tolerate compare placebo symptomatic COPD patient moderate severe airflow limitation already receive maintenance therapy inhale fixed-dose-combination salmeterol/fluticasone propionate ( 50/500 µg ) twice daily ( b.i.d . ) via multi-dose dry powder inhaler ( MDDPI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy NVA237 add-on Fixed Dose Combination LABA/ICS
